definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
station/to stand/to halt/to stop/branch of a company or organization/website

sentences.english: S: Yes, you can. Bring your card and receipt to replace it at Lao Jie Station.
sentences.chinese: 可以拿收據到老街地鐵站換。

sentences.english: Each station offers an individual architectural style.
sentences.chinese: 每個地鐵站都有一種獨立的建築風格。

sentences.english: It was a short walk from the Tai Wai East Rail MTR Station, and the shopfront is impressive.
sentences.chinese: 從大圍地鐵站行走一小段路，店面可是蠻可觀的。

sentences.english: Also, it is near the metro station and only ten minutes to the Star Ferry.
sentences.chinese: 加上鄰近地鐵站，步行到天星碼頭只要大概十分鐘。

sentences.english: Passengers stand on a platform at a metro station in Kolkata.
sentences.chinese: 加爾各答一座地鐵站站臺上，乘客們正在候車。

sentences.english: The road has been closed up for building the subway station.
sentences.chinese: 那條路已被堵起來修建地鐵站。

sentences.english: Mrs Wang and Alice are going toZhongshanParkunderground station.
sentences.chinese: 王太太和愛麗絲去中山公園地鐵站。

sentences.english: It's over by Dong Zhimen subway.
sentences.chinese: 它在東直門地鐵站附近。

sentences.english: En route to the subway I slipped on heels.
sentences.chinese: 在去往地鐵站的途中，我穿上了高跟鞋。

sentences.english: I move house to a apartment on Sengkang subway station.
sentences.chinese: 我們搬家了，我們搬到了盛港地鐵站上放的公寓。

sentences.english: Old photographs of the Moscow subway stations, the city of Ufa and a steamboat cruise.
sentences.chinese: 這些是莫斯科地鐵站，烏法城以及汽艇的舊照片。

sentences.english: Their office building was a goodish distance from the subway station.
sentences.chinese: 他們的辦公大樓離地鐵站很長一段距離。

sentences.english: Convenient stores and small shops are in some stations, lined up just outside the turnstiles.
sentences.chinese: 一些地鐵站有便利店和小商店，就在出入閘機外面。

sentences.english: Our School is located close to Tiu Keng Leng MTR station. School bus service is provided.
sentences.chinese: 本校鄰近調景嶺地鐵站，設有校巴服務。

sentences.english: How to get to the nearest subway station?
sentences.chinese: 如何從金橋回到龍陽路或近處的地鐵站？

sentences.english: Right opposite Clapham North tube station, and has an outside eating area too.
sentences.chinese: 正對着北克拉彭地鐵站，店門口還有露天餐區。
